Battle Cards
View On FortressMaximus.io

Unconventional Flying Object

  1. Which cards do not 'work' on a character in Body mode?
    The following cards apply to Bot mode and thus will not affect an enemy character in its Body mode:
    - Cornered!
    - Marksmanship
    The following cards apply to Bot mode and thus will not affect one of your characters in its Body mode:
    - Cliffjumper - Renegade Warrior's Alt mode ability
    - Conversion Expertise (still provides Tough 1 in Alt mode)
    - Escape Route
    - Hit and Run
    - Hunker Down (still upgrades with Armor if the character with Body mode is currently a Tank)
    - Pop a Wheelie (if there was a Motorcycle with a Body mode, it would not flip)
    - Roll Out!
    - Start Your Engines (still untaps if the character with Body mode is currently a Car)
    - Swerve
    - Unconventional Flying Object
  2. Question about Unconventional Flying Object. Can this be played on a Spaceship that is already in bot mode in order to flip it to alt mode, essentially ignoring the first sentence as "already done" (somewhat similar to Hunker Down)?
    No, it cannot.
  3. If the Spaceship is already in bot mode, what happens?
    You would flip it to alt mode, even though it’s not flipping “back.”
